code: export const getAccessToken=()=>{return sessionStorage.getItem('accessToken');};export const addElipsis=(str,limit)=>{return str.length>limit?str.subString(0,limit)+'...':str;};export const getType=(value,body)=>{if(value.params){return{params:body};}else if(value.query){if(typeof body==='object'){return{query:body._id};}else{return{query:body};}}return{};};
